name: Bunny on island
description:
A bunny is shipwrecked on an island and your task is to survive and get off the island.

Game controls

WASD + Mouse
Left click - Action
Right click  - Drop item
M - Mute sound
F - Fullscreen

Roadmap
  • Core game mechanics - done
  • Crafting - done
  • Mining - done
  • Save / Load - done
  • New materials
  • New recipes
  • Storage
  • Enemies
  • Weapon
  • And more ...

This game is not finished yet. I appreciate any feedback.

Follow the development on twitter Angelo Studio
